Package View_Controller

Class ApptTableViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • View_Controller.ApptTableViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class ApptTableViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class enables user to select buttons for going back to previous screen, adding/updating/deleting appointments. Appointment Table View screen displays list of all scheduled appointments in table view.

      • onActionFilterByMonthBtn

        public void onActionFilterByMonthBtn​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        This method allows user to filter appointments by month. Radio button selected will filter list to appointments scheduled only for current month.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - the event or mouse click on By Month radio button.

      • onActionFilterByWeekBtn

        public void onActionFilterByWeekBtn​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        This method allows user to filter appointments by week. Radio button selected will filter list to appointments occurring for current week.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - the event or mouse click on By Week radio button.

      • onActionFilterAllBtn

        public void onActionFilterAllBtn​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        This method allows user to list back all appointments. Radio button selected will list all scheduled appointments.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - the event or mouse click on All radio button.

      • onActionApptAddBtn

        public void onActionApptAddBtn​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        This method button enables user to add a new customer. Switches to next screen: Add Appointment screen.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - the event or mouse click on Add button.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • onActionApptUpdateBtn

        public void onActionApptUpdateBtn​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        This method enables user to update appointment information for appointment selected from the table view list. This jumps to next screen: Update Appointment screen.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - the event or mouse click on Update button.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • onActionApptDeleteBtn

        public void onActionApptDeleteBtn​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
